TimeSensitiveLogic.PayoutTiming: Payouts to earlier participants depend on the balance being sufficient to cover the payout amount in addPayout function.

ConditionalLogicPaths.ConditionalFeeReduction: If the transaction value is at least 50 ether, the fee percentage is reduced by 50%.
ConditionalLogicPaths.MultiplierAdjustment: The pyramid multiplier decreases at specific participant counts (10, 25) to adjust payout speed.
